K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-16: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dge slong ma de la bcom ldan 'das kyi yang dag par bstan pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-17: de nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo de la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-21: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-22: sems dga' ba lus su rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-23: rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-24: sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang; tha ba med pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' gang yin pa shes nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo dga' ba'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373a-25: lus su rung ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-0: @373b rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-1: sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-2: tha ba med pa'i sems kyis bsgoms pa'i stobs rab tu ldan pa yang dag par gsal bar byed pa'i chos bstan pa kun tu shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-3: de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gsal bar byed pa'i chos bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-8: lam rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo la rgya cher bstan pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-9: de nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-12: lam mngon par rtogs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-14: gos bkrus pa dri ma med pa tshon gyis bsgyur na tshon yang dag par len pa bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-15: dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo stan de nyid du 'dug nas bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-18: lam rnams mngon par rtogs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:373b-19: de nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mos chos mthong zhing chos thob la chos rtogs shing chos mthar thug par khong du chud nas the tshom las brgal zhing som nyi spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-0: tha snyad rnams dang bral zhing dri ma med pa thob pas gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi bkri bar ston pa'i bstan pa la chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs @374a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-4: bdag gis ni nongs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-5: bde bar gshegs pa; bdag gis nongs lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-10: bdag ni shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can lags te; gang bdag gis dge slong kun dga' bo khyim thab tu 'tshal ba kun nas tshul ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-13: bdag gis nongs pa la nongs par khums shing yang nongs pa la mchog tu nongs par khums nas nongs pa de bshags par bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-14: slan chad kyang nongs pa bsdam par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-15: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis nongs par bzung nas nongs pa bsdam par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-17: khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-20: 'di ltar mi gsal ba 'di ltar mi dge ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374a-21: shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin gyis gang khyod kyis dge slong kun dga' bo la khyim thab tu 'dzin zhing tshul bzhin ma yin pa byas pa la chos 'dul ba rtogs nas gang khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par yang dag par lta zhing nyes pa la nyes par yang dag par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-0: de bzhin du nyes pa 'chags shing phyin chad sdom pa @374b ni ngas kyang khyod kyi nyes pa la nyes par gzung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-1: phyin chad sdom la dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba nyid bsgrub par bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-3: de nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan zhing khyad par du rjes su gdams pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-4: gcig pu dben par gnas shing bag yod pas gdams shing dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-5: shes bzhin rab tu nyams pa med pa'i bdag nyid gnas gcig pu dben par bag yod par bsdams shing dran pa dang shes bzhin nyams pa med pas bdag nyid gnas pas gang gi don du rigs kyi bu mo skra bregs nas chos gos bgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-6: yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa'i tshangs par spyod pa la kun tu gnas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-7: mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gis mngon par shes pa mngon du byas shing bskyed nas lung ston par byed pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-8: des tshangs par spyad pas bya ba byas shing skye bzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-9: srid par skye ba gzhan mi len par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-10: mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-11: khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gdol ba'i bu mo rab tu phyung ngo zhes thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-12: thos nas kyang ji ltar gdol ba'i bu mo dge slong rnams dang yang dag par spyod par byed ces smod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-13: de bzhin du dge slong rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:374b-16: dge bsnyen rnams dang yang dag par spyad pa spyod par byed ces smos par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-0: ji ltar gdol ba'i bu mo la @375a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-3: khyim bdag shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams blta bar bya zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-4: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gdol pa'i bu mo rab tu phyung zhes grag pa thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-5: thos nas kyang ji ltar gdol ba'i bu mo zhes bya ba dang dge slong rnams yang dag par spyad pa spyod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-8: dge bsnyen ma rnams dang yang dag par spyad pa spyod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-11: khyim bdag shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams kyis blta bar bya zhes smod la sems par byed cing bzhon pa bzang po sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-12: bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-13: khyim bdag gi tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas mnyan yod nas 'phags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-14: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-15: ji srid bzhon pas 'gro ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas phyin nas bzhon pa la babs nas rkang thang gi 'khor gyis bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-16: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-17: zhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-0: mnyan yod kyi bram ze @375b dang; khyim bdag gi tshogs chen po de dag kyang tha snyad lnga dang ldan pas 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-1: yang bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du phyogs te yang dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-2: mgu bar gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-3: mjug brtul ba dang phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-4: yang gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gi pha ma'i rgyus dang; ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-6: rus rnams bsnyad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-7: yang gzhan dag gis lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-8: gzhan dag ni yang mthun par cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-10: mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang; khyim bdag gi tshogs chen po de rnams kyi sems thugs kyis mkhyen dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo'i sngon gyi gnas skabs bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir dge slong ma de bkug nas dge slong rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon sum du dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo'i sngon gyi gnas skabs las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam nyan par 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:375b-15: de'i dus la bab lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-2: bcom ldan 'das gang dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo'i sngon gyi gnas skabs las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-3: bcom ldan 'das la slar mnyan nas gzung bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-5: de lta bas na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-7: legs so; ;legs so zhes gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-8: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-9: de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-11: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-12: chu bo gangg'a'i 'gram na aa ti mug ta ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-13: s'a la'i tshal gyi nags kyi phyogs gcig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-14: de na tre shang ku zhes bya ba'i gdol ba'i rgyal po yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-15: gdol pa stong phrag du ma'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-18: gdol ba'i rgyal po tre shang ku zhes bya ba des skye ba snga ma'i rig byed kyi yan lag dang; nye ba'i yan lag dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-19: gsang ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-20: nges par sbyar ba'i brda dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-21: yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-22: bzhad gad ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-24: bstan bcos gzhan yang rkyang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376a-26: rgyan phan ba'i gtsug lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-0: skyes bu chen po'i @376b mtshan rnams la rjes su mkhas shing ji ltar chos bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-1: rig byed kyi brtul zhugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-2: rten pa med par bshad pa la mkhas pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-3: yang rgyal po tre shang ku de la gzhon nu stag rna zhes bya ba'i bu yod pa de gzugs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-7: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-8: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-9: kha dog mdzad shing mchog tu kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-10: de nas rgyal po tre shang ku gzhon nu stag rna la skye ba snga ma'i rig byed dran pa bslabs te; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-13: gsang ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-14: nges par sbyar ba'i brda dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-15: yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-16: bzhad gad ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-18: bstan bcos gzhan yang chos ji ltar bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-19: rig byed kyis brtul zhugs bslabs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-20: de nas rgyal po tre shang kus 'di snyam du bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-21: bdag gi bu gzhon nu stag rna 'di ni gzugs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-25: yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa; gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-26: kha dog mdzad shing mchog tu kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:376b-28: rig byed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-0: khyim bya ste yang gang bdag @377a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-1: gis gzhon nu stag rna dang mthun par gzugs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-4: yon tan dang ldan pa de lta bu'i bu mo zhig gang nas btsal snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-5: yang dus gzhan zhig gi tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-6: bram ze padma'i snying po zhes bya ba gyen du 'byung ba'i lung pa'i sgo zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-14: ma mes bdun brgyud kyi mkhan por gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-17: rig byed gsum gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yan lag dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-18: nye ba'i yan lag dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-19: brda nges par sbyar ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-20: bzhad gad ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-24: 'jig rten rgyang ban pa'i gtsug lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-26: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams rjes su sbyar ba rgyas shing grol bar ston pa zhig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-27: yang bram ze padma'i snying po de la gzugs bzang mo zhes bya ba'i bu mo yid du 'ong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-31: yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-32: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377a-33: mdzas shing mchog tu kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-0: bdag gi gzhon nu stag rna dang mthun @377b pas chung mar 'os so zhes bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-1: de nas rgyal po tre shang kus don de nyid mtshan mo phal cher sems shing mtshan mo 'das nas nam nangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-2: thams cad dkar ba'i shing rta la zhon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-3: gdol ba'i blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas gdol ba'i pho brang nas byung nas byang phyogs su chas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-4: gyen du 'byung ba'i lung ba'i sgo ga la ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-5: de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus gyen du 'byung ba'i lung pa'i sgo byang shar gyi mtshams na yid bde ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal shing sna tshogs pas khyab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-6: shing sna tshogs pa'i me tog dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-7: bya sna tshogs pa sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-8: lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal ltar mdzes pa zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-9: der phyin nas bram ze padma'i snying po 'ong ba la sdod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-10: bram ze padma'i snying po bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bram ze'i sngags 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-11: de nas bram ze padma'i snying po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas thams cad dkar ba'i rta'i shing rta la zhon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-12: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya'i slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-14: bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bram ze'i sngags 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-15: gdol ba'i rgyal po tre shang kus bram ze padma'i snying po nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-16: me 'bar ba 'od kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:377b-17: mchod sbyin byed pa bram ze'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-1: gyi tshogs kyis mdzes lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-2: rgya mtsho rin po ches mdzes pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-3: zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-4: rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-5: brgya byin lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-6: bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba mdzes pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-7: mthong nas kyang bsu ste chos bzhin du byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-9: legs par 'dir byon gyis bya ba cung zhig smrar yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-11: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-12: bram ze padma'i snying pos gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-14: bram ze ma yin pas kye zhes bod par mi nus shing rigs pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-16: bdag gis kye zhes pod par mi nus shing byar rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-17: gang gis nus par byar rung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-18: gang gis de ltar mi nus pa ni de ltar yang mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-20: skyes bu'i mnyam par rtsom pa ni sngon gyi mnyam par rtsom pa las 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378a-24: bdag gi 'khor gyi don dang; 'byung po thams cad kyi don bsdus pa ni da ltar 'dir khyad par du don che ba gang yin pa smra yi nyon cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:378b-1: tshig de lta bu yang thos pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-3: lto ba ni ri rnams yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-7: ba spu rnams ni rtsa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-10: chu bo rnams ni de'i gcin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-11: mtsho rnams ni de'i mi gtsang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-12: de lta bu ni skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs par 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-13: tshangs pa rang gi mtshan nyid ni de lta yin par rigs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-15: tshangs pa gang yin pa de las bram ze rnams kyang byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-18: dmangs rigs rnams kyang byung bar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-19: de ltar na gal te skyes par nges par gyur na yang 'di ltar 'gyur zhing rigs bye brag tu byas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-20: bram ze rnams tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing rigs gsum po mtho ris su mi 'gro na ni de ltar na rigs bye brag tu byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-21: de lta ma yin na rigs bzhir mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-22: gang gi phyir rigs bzhi po tha dad pa rnams ni dge ba'i las byas pas mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385a-23: yang des na drang srong rnams kyang zhi ba'i dka' thub spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-0: de'i phyir bram ze rnams @385b la khyad par du gyur pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-1: gal te bram ze gcig la 'dir lce gnyis yod par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-2: de bzhin dbang po gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-4: mgo bo gnyis yod na de lta na bram ze'i rigs khyad par du byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-5: chags pas phyin nas gzhan dag gsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-6: de lta bur 'gro zhing gnod par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-7: sems can rnams la las kyi sun 'byin zhing des yang 'di ltar bram ze rnams ni mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-9: pha dang yang 'khrug cing ba lang gsod par sems pa ni 'dir bram ze rnams kyi lugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-10: srid srung gi rig byed las sngags kyis skrag par byed pa ni bram ze rnams kyi bya ba yin par bstan to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-19: sen mo dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:385b-20: pags pa dang bcas pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386a-20: nye dus btags pa de nyid rigs yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386a-21: gang de ltar rnam par shes pa de las gzhan du gyur pa ni 'ga' yang med do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386a-25: rje'u rigs zhes bya ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386a-33: tha dad pa rab tu gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386b-1: bzhin rang rang gi las kyis grub pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386b-2: de lta bu'i 'gro ba la bram zer gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386b-3: gang gis rigs khyad par du byas pa de bas na rigs yod pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386b-4: bye brag yod pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:386b-5: rigs bzhi nyid du ma grub bo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387a-8: gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387a-9: bram ze padma'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387a-15: de lta bas na khyod la bram ze'i lhan cig pa'i chos de dag rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas bshad par bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387a-19: bram ze'i rigs zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387a-20: rgyal rigs zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387a-21: rje'u rigs zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387a-22: dmangs rigs zhes bya ba 'di thams cad gcig ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387a-30: nad kyis yongs su bar du gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-0: zug rngu'i bar chad @387b gang yin pa bdag gis bar chad rnams spangs nas dgon par phyin la rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-4: yal ga rnams las rtsva'i spyil bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-5: lo ma'i spyil bu byas nas bsam gtan byed cing gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-6: dus tshigs su zas don du gnyer bar nang par grong du bsod snyoms su rgyu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-7: de nas grong khyer na gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-9: sems can 'di dag ni mchog tu dga' ba byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-10: bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su spangs nas grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-13: yul nas 'phags pas; de dag la phyi rol tu dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-14: phyi rol tu dga' ba zhes tha snyad du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-16: grong khyer la dga' ba'i sems can rnams bkur stir byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-19: mchod par byed cing de dag la sbyin par sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-20: de na sems can de dag nyid sems can gzhan khrims la gnas pa'i nor don du gnyer bar grong khyer du babs nas sngags kyi tshig klog tu 'jug go /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:387b-22: sems can gzhan klog tu 'jug pas sems can de la klog tu 'jug pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:388a-0: dus la bab na rigs pas las @388a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:388a-1: kyi mtha' byed pas de dag la rje rigs /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:388a-5: sems can gzhan dag ni smad pa'i las byed pas bdag 'tsho bas na de dag la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-5: goo ta ma la ni brgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-6: bram ze dang mnyam pa la ni brgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-7: chen po dang mnyam pa la ni lnga brgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-8: bzhon pa chen po la ni brgya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-12: bram ze rnams kyi rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma 'dis lam mtshon pa ni bram ze thams cad kyi lam mo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-20: de las ka tha ni bcu'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-24: rang gi rkang mchog la ni bcu drug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-25: drang srong ni bzhi cu rtsa gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-26: 'di ltar bram ze lam gyi cha ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gyur pa las nyi shu rtsa gcig tu phye ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:389a-27: bram ze rnams kyi rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma ni srid srung gi sde tshan rnams te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:398a-16: skad cig ma rnams kyi tshad grub pa ji lta bu yud tsam rnams kyi ni ji lta ba yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:398a-19: thung bar 'dren pa ma yin pa de lta bu ni de nyid de'i skad cig ma de'i tshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:398a-20: de'i skad cig ma nyi shu rtsa drug la skad cig gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:398a-21: skad cig drug la ni thang cig gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:398a-22: thang cig gsum la ni yud tsam gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:398a-23: de lta bu'i rim pas rjes su 'brel pa'i yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag tu shes par bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:398b-0: nyi ma shar ba na skyes bu drug cu rtsa dgu'i grim ma @398b 'jal ba ni 'thon po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:398b-1: skyes bu drug cus gzhal ba'i grib ma ni dkar po zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:399a-0: skyes bu bcu gnyis kyis bcal ba'i grib ma'i yun ni nor zhes bya ba'i yud @399a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:399a-3: skyes bu drug cu rtsa dgus bcal ba'i grib ma'i yun ni gzhan 'jigs zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:399b-33: mchog dka' bcu drug la ni dus tshod gcig go /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-0: de la chu tshod gnyis la ni yud tsam gcig @400a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-1: go; yud tsam gcig gi tshad ci tsam zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-3: chu tshod kyi bum pa'i tshad ci tsam zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-4: 'ol ma se gcig gis gser sor bzhi bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-5: phyogs bzhi nas mnyam par bzlums pa'i tshad kyi bum pa'i zhabs su brtol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-6: chu zad pa de nyi chu tshod gcig gi tshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-7: chu tshod gnyis ni yud tsam gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-9: de lta bu'i yud tsam sum cu la ni zhag gcig tu 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-10: mig 'byed 'dzum bcu drug ni mchog dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-11: mchog dka' bcu drug la ni dus tshod gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-12: dus tshod drug cu rtsa bzhi la ni yud tsam gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-13: yud tsam sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-14: nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-16: btsums pa bye ba phrag bcu drug pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-17: stong phrag brgyad cu la ni lo gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-18: yang de lta bu de ni re zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-20: dus 'byung ba bshad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-23: dpag tshad bskyed pa nyon cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-25: rdul phran bdun la ni mthong ba thams cad las phra ba'i nyi zer gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-26: nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-27: ri bong gi rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400a-28: lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-0: @400b glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-1: sro ma bdun la ni shig gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-2: shig bdun la ni nas gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-3: nas bdun la ni sor gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-4: sor bcu gnyis la ni mtho gang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-5: mtho do la ni khru gang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-6: khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-7: gzhu stong la ni rgyang grags gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-8: rgyang grags bzhi la ni ma ga dha'i dpag tshad gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-9: dpag tshad gcig la rdul phra rab bye ba phrag 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-10: bye ba brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa dgu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-11: yang de lta bu ni dpag tshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-13: gser bskyed pa'i tshad bshad par bya yi nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-14: nas bcu gnyis la ni ma sha ka gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-15: ma sha ka bcu drug la ni zho gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-18: zho gcig la rdul phra rab bye ba phrag gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-19: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-20: brgya phrag lnga dang nyag brgyad yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-22: yang de lta bu de ni gser bskyed pa'i tshad yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-25: ma sha ka drug cu rtsa bzhi la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-26: ma ga dha'i srang gi srang gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-27: de ni srang gi tshad mdor bsdus pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-28: srang gcig la rdul phra rab bye ba phrag brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-29: brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-30: bdun stong nyis brgya dang nyag brgyad cu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-32: yang de lta bu de ni srang gi tshad yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-34: khu ba gzhal pa rnams kyi tshad nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:400b-35: ma ga dha'i srang nyi shu rtsa bzhi bre gang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:401a-2: ma ga dha pa rnams kyang srang dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:407b-5: phyis ni gza' chen po'i stobs kyis gnod pas bud med dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:408a-0: char des lo thog thams cad phun s @408a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:408a-2: gnyen mi rnams kyis longs spyod cing ljongs la gnod pa med par gyur pas mdza' bo dang ldan par 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:408a-5: gnyis su char phun sum tshogs shing skye bo rnams 'dus pa ldan zhing rkun ma stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:408a-8: de lo nyes pas skye bo rnams 'chi bar 'gyur zhing rgyal po phan tshun 'thab cing bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:408a-10: bra nye'i yin par bstan to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:408a-18: ma ga dhe pa rnams la nad nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:408b-1: gang gi tshe mgo dang gza' sgra gcan du ldan pas ni lus 'phags pa rnams dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409a-2: gang gi tshe chu stod dang sgra gcan du ldan pas ni aa ban ti pa rnams la nad 'byung ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409a-6: zangs gling pa rnams la nad 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409a-7: gang gi tshe gro bzhin sgra gcan du ldan pas ni rkun ma la nad 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409a-8: gang gi tshe mon gre dang sgra gcan du ldan pas ni ku ru pa dang; rna can pa rnams la nad 'byung ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-1: de la ni me'i bya ba bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-2: me lha mnyes par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-3: sbyin sreg byas na 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-4: de la ba lang gi gnas bya zhing zho dkrogs na mar che la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-8: snod thams cad bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-9: rin po che bcang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-10: las kyi mtha' bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-13: khyim du me sbar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-15: dmar po'i sa bon gdab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-16: khyim byas pa la der 'dug par bsgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-17: gos sar pa bgo bar bya zhing rin gyis ni nyo bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-18: las drag po bsgrub pa g-yul 'gyed pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-26: drag po'i las brtsams zhing rkun ma 'gyed pa bzang zhing de la skyes pa tshe ring ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:409b-27: grags pa dang ldan pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-2: bdag nyid kyi drag shul bya dgos pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-4: sa bon thams cad gdab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-5: gos bgo bar bya bar bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-6: bu lon brdar mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-9: chang gi sbyor ba gnyis spang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-10: nyin par de la bab nas gang skyes kyang bkra shis shing snying rje dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-11: bzod pa ldan zhing bud med dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-13: tshe ring zhing phyugs mang la nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-14: 'bru mang zhing longs spyod che zhing de la rgyal bar 'gyur te; snar ma la bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-16: dal ba'i las thams cad bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-17: las gang snar ma la bya bar bstan pa de dag thams cad la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-18: 'o ma dang ldan pa'i shing las bzho ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-19: 'o ma can gyi sa bon gdab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-20: rgyal po rgyal sar 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-21: gnas kyi don du 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-24: ba lang gdul ba la mchog tu bzang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-25: gos sar ba bgo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-26: rgyan gyis brgyan par mi bya zhing bram ze rnams kyi las thams cad de la bya bar rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-27: nyi ma de la char bab pa de ni legs par bab par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410a-28: nyi ma de la skyes pa gnyid che zhing yid g-yengs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-1: lag la ni don gnyer ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-2: las bzang po bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-3: drag po'i las rnams 'grub pas mkhas pas 'bad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-6: rdzing bu de la bya bar bzang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-7: ba thul ma gsar ma nyo na 'grub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-8: mar khu btsir ba'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-10: bur shing gi sa bon gzugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-11: nyi ma de la char pa bab na char mang du 'bab par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-12: nyi ma de la skyes pa khro zhing ri dvags kyi rngon pa byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-14: nam so la ni kha dog bcang bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-16: gtsug phud bzhag pa la rung zhing sngags thams cad 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-17: bu don du gnyer bar chung ma blang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-19: yang du bya bar 'dod pa'i las de rnams bya bar bzang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-20: gal te 'chi ba'i dogs pa yod pas g-yo ba'i las mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-21: nyin zhag de la skyes pa mchog tu shis shing 'dod pa chung la bud med kyi chags pa skyes bu de che zhing sna tshogs pa shes shing gcig la mi 'jug par bstan te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-29: bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:410b-31: rgyal po dbang bskur ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:411b-17: grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:411b-28: nyi ma de la char ba bab pa mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur zhing de la skyes pa ni dpa' zhing rku ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-14: sman thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la gnod par byed pa'i gza' gnas pas bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-16: rgyu skar rnams kyi ming gi le'u bshad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-19: rgyu skar bzhi po 'di dag ni bde bar byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-22: de bram ze gnas par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-23: de la gnas bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-24: rgyal po dbang bskur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-25: gang so sor bstan pa'i las rnams bya bar bzang zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-29: bcing ba rnams byas na bkra shis par 'gyur bar bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-31: de la skyes pa bkra shis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:415b-32: sbyor ba chen po dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-1: ni bde bar byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-6: las bya ba la myur zhing kha ton brtsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-9: las rnams myur bar bya zhing mtshon gyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-10: sman gyi las rnams bya zhing zla ba bzhi pa'i mchod sbyin bya bar brtsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-14: bcing ba rnams bkra shis par brjod par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-16: de la skyes pa ni bkra shis shing longs spyod dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-18: longs spyod du ldan zhing gong ma la sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-19: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs su 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-20: yang bram ze zhig mdun na 'don du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-22: rgyu skar lnga po 'di dag drag po ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-27: yang de dag la bshig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-29: bcing ba rnams mi 'tsho bar brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-36: mon gru zhes bya ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-39: bra nye ni zhing gnyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-41: smad gsum gyi gnyis kyi cha'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416a-45: stod gsum po de dag ni cha nges pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-8: rgyu skar 'di dag cha phyi ma'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-9: yud tsam sum cu'i zhing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-10: byi bzhin gyi yud tsam mnyam pas rgyal rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-13: dge ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-14: mi dge ba'i yud tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-15: rgyu skar thams cad dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-16: gang gi gnyis ka dge ba'i yud tsam dang ldan pa'i dge bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-17: yang gang gi tshe dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-18: mi dge bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-20: mtshan mo ring thung du 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-23: tshes gnam stong du ldan par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-24: gnam stong snga ma gro bzhin dang 'dzom na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-25: nyin par la yud tsam bcu bdun yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-26: mtshan mo la yud tsam bcu gsum du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-27: shing bu sor drug pa nyi ma phyed la btsugs nas grib ma la sor phyed phyed kyis 'phel zhing nyi ma 'gyur la; chu stod dang mtshan mo ldan la nyi ma dang mgo 'grogs shing dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa'i gnam stong dang mchur 'dzom pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-28: dbyar gyi gnyis pa'i bco lnga dang khrums stod du ldan na nyin par ni yud tsam bcu drug tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-29: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bzhir 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:416b-30: sor gnyis kyi grib ma 'phel zhing bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-1: ldan pa la nyi ma dang rgyal du 'grogs shing dbyar zla tha chung gi gnam stong dang chu stong du 'dzon par 'gyur zhing tshes bco lnga la tha skar du 'dzom na yud tsam bco lnga nyin par la yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-2: mtshan mo la'ang yud tsam bco lnga yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-3: sor gsum gyis grib ma 'phel zhing nyi ma 'gyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-4: chu stod dang mtshan mor ldan la mchu dang nyin mor 'grogs shing nag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-5: dbyar gyi zla ba bzhi pa'i gnam stong du 'dzom la smin drug dang tshes bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la yud tsam bcu gsum yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-6: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bdun yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-7: sor bzhi'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyed la rgyu skar tha skar dang mtshan mor ldan la chu stong dang nyin mor 'grogs na dgun gyi zla ba dang po'i gnam stong dang lha mtshams su 'dzom zhing mgo dang bco lngar ldan na nyin par la yud tsam bcu gsum yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-8: mtshan mo la yud tsam bcu bdun yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-9: sor lnga'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyed cing smin drug dang mtshan mor 'dzom la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-10: nag pa dang nyin par 'grogs shing dgun gyi zla ba gnyis pa'i gnam stong dang snron du 'dzom par 'gyur zhing rgyal dang bco lngar ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-11: nyin par la yud tsam bcu gnyis yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417a-12: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bco brgyad yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-0: sor drug gi grib @417b mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing mgo dang mtshan mor 'dzom la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-1: sa ga dang nyi mar 'grogs shing dgun gyi zla ba gnyis pa'i gnam stod dang chu stod du 'dzom la mchu dang bco lngar ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-2: nyin par la ni yud tsam bcu gsum yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-3: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bdun yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-4: sor lnga'i grib ma 'grib pas nyi ma 'gyur zhing rgyal dang mtshan mor 'dzom la snron dang nyi ma 'grogs shing dgun gyi zla ba bzhi pa'i gnam stong dang gro bzhin du 'dzom la chu stod dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la yud tsam bcu bzhi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-5: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu drug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-6: sor bzhi'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing mchu dang mtshan mor 'dzom la chu stod dang nyi ma 'grogs shing dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong dang khrums stod du 'dzom par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-7: nag pa dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin bar la ni yud tsam bco lngar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-8: mtshan mo la'ang yud tsam bco lngar 'gyur zhing sor gsum gyi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing chu stod dang mtshan mor 'dzom la gro bzhin dang nyi mar 'grogs par 'gyur zhing dpyid kyi zla ba gnyis pa'i gnam stong dang tha skar du 'dzom la sa ga dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la ni yud tsam bcu drug tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:417b-9: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bzhi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-0: sor gnyis kyi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing nag pa dang mtshan mor 'dzom la khrums stod dang nyi mar 'grogs @418a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-1: par 'gyur zhing dpyid kyi zla ba gsum pa'i gnam stong dang smin drug tu 'dzom par gyur la snrubs dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la ni yud tsam bcu bdun du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-2: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu gsum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-3: sor gnyis kyi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing snron dang mtshan mor 'dzom la smin drug dang nyi mar 'dzom par gyur cing dpyid kyi zla ba bzhi pa'i gnam stong dang rgyal du 'dzom par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-4: chu stod dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la ni yud tsam bco brgyad du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-5: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-6: nyi ma phyed skad la sor phyed pa'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing chu stod dang mtshan mor 'dzom la rgyal dang nyin par 'grogs par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-7: lo btsal bas yud tsam gyi bye brag rnams kyis rgyu skar de thams cad la cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-8: cha ru bgo zhing gnam stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-9: bco lngar phye bas mtshan mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-10: nyin zhag tu shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-11: lo lnga lnga zhing zla ba re re lhag par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-12: zla ba drug na nyin mtshan mnyam par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-13: de las gzhan zla ba drug ni nyi ma ring la yang zla ba drug na mtshan mo ring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-14: zla ba drug drug ni yud tsam de dag mnyam par rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-15: zla ba drug ni nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418a-16: zla ba drug ni lho phyogs su rgyu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-0: zla ba drug ni @418b rgya mtsho la lhag par 'bab par 'gyur zhing zla ba'i 'gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-1: nyi ma'i 'gros kyis dus 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-2: rtsis dang bral bas shes par mi nus pa de ni 'di ltar lo yin par bshad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-10: 'di rnams kyi gtso bo ni phur bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-14: pa ba sangs te de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'gros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-18: mgo ste de dag ni thu na mong gi dang po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-22: skag dang de dag ni thun mong ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-29: de dag ni thun mong gi dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-33: de dag ni thun mong pa dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-39: de dag ni 'jigs pa chen por gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:418b-46: de dag ni thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor drug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-0: gang gi tshe rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor las nad de dang de'i ljongs su de'i nad yin @419a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-2: yud tsam bcu gnyis pa'i nyin par ni gza' bcu gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-3: mtshan mo yud tsam drug drug rgyu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-5: dbyar zla ba rdzogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-6: nyin par la yud tsam bcu bdun yod cing nyi ma shar nas bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-7: nyi ma 'phags nas ni rnam par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-8: yud tsam bcu gsum dang ldan pa'i mtshan mo la yud tsam drug la yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-9: tsha bas gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du nam nangs pa dang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-10: dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa'i bco lnga la yud tsam bcu drug nyin par la yod cing nyi ma shar ba na bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-11: phyed la ni mi pham zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-12: nyi ma 'phags nas ni drag po zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-13: yud tsam bcu bzhi dang ldan pa'i mtshan mo la ni nyi ma nub par rtsom pa rnam par rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-14: mtshan phyed la ni sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-15: nam nangs pa na ni me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419a-16: rta 'thab pa'i bco lnga ni yud tsam bco lnga dang ldan pa'i nyin par la nyi ma 'char ba la ni bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-0: @419b nyi ma 'phags nas ni mi pham zhes bya ba'i rjes thogs la dbus ma zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-1: nyi ma de las 'phags pa'i lha'i char zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-2: yud tsam bco lnga dang ldan pa'i mtshan mo nyi ma nub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-3: drag po zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-4: mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-5: 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i yud tsam gyi rjes thogs la mtshan mo phyed du gyur nas nam nangs pa ni me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-6: rta 'thab pa'i tshes bco lnga la nyin mtshan mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i nyin par la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-7: yud tsam bco lngar 'gyur zhing mtshan mo la yud tsam bco lnga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-8: yud tsam nyin mtshan mnyam pa na nyi ma shar ba na bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-9: cha mnyam par dbus na gnas pa na mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-10: nyi ma nub nas mtshan mo la bab pa na lha'i cha shas zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-11: mtshan phyed la ni mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-12: nam nangs pa na ni me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:419b-13: ston zla 'bring po'i bco lnga la yud tsam bcu bzhi'i nyin mo la yod cing nyi ma shar ba na bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-0: dga' bral dang mnyam pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i yud tsam gyi rjes la dbus su 'gyur nas nyi ma nub pa na chu zla zhes bya ba'i @420a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-2: mtshan mo la yud tsam bcu drug dang ldan la nyi ma nub na rgyud ces bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-3: srid po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-4: mi pham pa zhes bya ba de'i rjes la mtshan mo phyed du gyur nas nam nangs pa na me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-5: dgun zla ra ba'i bco lnga la yud tsam bcu gsum dang nyin par ldan la nyi ma shar ba na bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-6: phyed la ni dga' bral zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-7: nyi ma nub pa la ni bden bral zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-8: yud tsam bcu bdun dang ldan pa'i mtshan mo la nyi ma nub pa tsam na chu lha zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-9: mtshan phyed la ni srin po zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-10: nam nangs pa me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-11: dgun zla 'bring po'i bco lnga la ni yud tsam bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i nyin par nyi ma shar ba na bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-13: dga' bral zhes bya ba'i rjes la dbus su 'gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-14: nyi ma nub pa na rdul med ces bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420a-15: yud tsam bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i mtshan mo nyi ma nub tsam na bden bral zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-0: @420b srin po zhes bya ba'i rjes la mtshan phyed du gyur nas nam nangs pa na me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-1: ji ltar sos ga'i dang po de ltar dbyar dang po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-2: ji ltar dpyid ka'i gnyis pa de ltar dbyar gnyis pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-3: ji ltar dpyid ka'i dang po de ltar ston dang po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-4: ji ltar dgun gyi bzhi pa'i de ltar ston tha chung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-5: ji ltar dgun 'bring de ltar dgun dang po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-6: ji ltar dgun 'bring de ltar sos ka'i gnyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-7: de lta bur ni rgyu skar rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-8: rgyu zhing rgyu bar shes par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-9: rgyu skar rgyu ba dang po'i le'u 'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-10: ji ltar rgyu skar de dag gi nang nas nyin mtshan du ldan pas 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-11: 'grib par 'gyur bas 'gribs pa las nyin par 'phel ba'i bco lnga la zla ba phyed las gnyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-14: bcu gnyis pa de dag mtshams kyi zhag 'das nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-15: nub mos 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po shin tu 'chi ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-16: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-18: tha dad pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba de dag 'thab pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi g-yo ba las sa 'gul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-23: legs ldan rnam pa bzhi po'ang gang du zla ba phyed la lan gsum g-yos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:420b-24: zla ba gcig la lan drug g-yos par gyur na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-1: la g-yos na zhag bcu'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-2: sos ka'i zla ba dang po la yang dang yang du g-yos na zhag bcu gnyis kyi bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-3: sos ka'i zla ba gnyis pa la yang yang g-yos na nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-4: dbyar zla ra ba la yang yang g-yos na zhag bdun cu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-5: dbyar zla 'bring po la yang yang g-yos na zla ba gsum dang zhag bcu'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-6: ston zla tha chung la yang yang g-yos na zhag lnga'i bar du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-7: dgun gyi zla ba gnyis pa la yang yang g-yos na zhag lnga bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-8: dgun gyi zla ba gsum pa la yang yang g-yos na zhag brgya'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-9: dgun gyi zla ba bzhi pa la yang yang g-yos na zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-10: dpyid zla ra ba la yang yang g-yos na zhag sum cu'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-11: de dag nis g-yos pa'i dus ji tsam na smin pa yin par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-12: de dag gi las kyi 'jug pa ni 'di ltar zla ba thams cad la dus rtag tu sa g-yo zhing shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421a-14: chu rnams g-yo zhing shing rnams kyi lo ma ltar g-yon bskal ba lha bu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-2: 'brog rnams na gnas pa'i mi rnams myur du 'pho zhing dgon par lo bco lnga'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-3: phyogs rnams nas sa rnam par g-yos na mi bde ba mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-4: smin drug la sa g-yos na grong khyer dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-5: grong rnams yang dang yang du mes bsregs pas rtsva 'ang mi lus par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-6: de las rnam par g-yos na sol ba mkhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-9: mes skor byas pa'i gza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-11: lam du zhugs pa na zhing sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-12: snar ma la sa g-yos na sa bon thams cad nyams pas 'bru rnams 'thob par mi 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-13: bud med sbrum ma rnams mngal na nad 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-16: nad kyis btab pa'i mi rnams sum cha 'tsho bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-19: dpal dang ldan pa'i mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-20: mi'i mchog rnams nad kyis btab par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-21: mgo la sa g-yos na sman rnams nyams shing sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-24: bram ze nags na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-25: dka' thub pa de dag la nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-26: lag las rnam par g-yos na 'o ma can gyi shing rnams nyams shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:421b-27: zas dang skom dkon zhing 'gron po yul 'khor chas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-3: rgun ma rnams las g-yos pa'i nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-4: yang nam so las rnam par g-yos na dkyil 'khor byed pa'i zhal ta pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-11: dung 'tsho ba rnams las rnam par g-yos pas nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-12: rgyal la sa rnam par g-yos na bram ze rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-13: de bzhin du gtso bo rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-16: tshong pa ring por 'gro ba rnams la nad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing ser bas 'bru rnams rlog cing ri khrod na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bsnyen bkur ba rnams sa rnam par g-yos pas nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-17: skag la sa rnam par g-yos na klu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-18: sbrul kha sdig pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-23: klu mgo gcig pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-26: sems can khung du 'jug pa rnams sa rnam par g-yos pas nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422a-27: mchu las rnam bar g-yos na rgyal po rnams la nad 'byung zhing mchod sbyin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-0: shing @422b las log pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-1: 'dus pa'i ston mo las log pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-2: lha'i mchod sbyin las log pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-3: de la log pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-4: gang zhig de la skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-6: gang mkhas pa'i mchog tu gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-9: rigs mthon po rnams nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-10: chu stod la sa rnam par g-yos na dus 'gyur zhing chos la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-11: sho gam gyis 'tsho ba rnams la sa g-yos na nad kyis 'thebs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-12: gal te chu smad la sa rnam par g-yos na tshod pa gling du 'gro ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-14: ri khrod na 'tsho ba rnams aang ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-16: ma ga dha pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-17: ni ti'i bud med blangs pa rnams sa rnam par g-yos pa'i nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-18: me bzhi la sa rnam par g-yos pas na rdza mkhan rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-20: tshogs kyi gtso bo rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-21: blon po chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-22: dmag dpon rnams sa rnam par g-yos pa'i nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-23: 'di ltar nam so la sa g-yos pa yang snga ma bzhin du blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-24: sa ri la sa rnam par g-yos na rkun ma tshul khrims nyams pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:422b-26: shan pa la dga' ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-2: rlung za'i dka' thung pa rnams g-yos nas nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-3: sa ga la sa rnam par g-yos na ri chen po rnams 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-5: lam na 'gro ba la rlung drag pos rdo rnams 'thor bas stobs med par byed la sa g-yos pas de dag nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-6: yang nag pa la sa g-yos na rkun ma chen pos gnod pa byed pa 'ong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-9: mdud pa 'grol ba'i mi rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-11: bu ram shing 'phel ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-12: phu lin pa rnams la skyabs med pa'i 'jigs pa 'ong zhing grogs dang 'bral zhing stobs che ba 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-13: snron la sa g-yos na rgyal po chen po la gnod pa 'byung zhing khra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-16: de bzhin du gcan gzan gdug pa can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-17: gzhan gnod pa byed pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-20: ba lhi ba gra ha pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-22: de la gus pa'i mi rnams myur bar sa g-yos pas nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-23: snrubs la sa g-yos na rkang bzhi pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423a-25: de bzhin du gnod sbyin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-0: chu med pas lo @423b nyes shing myur du mu ge 'byung zhing ri rnams 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-1: chu stod la sa g-yos na chu la gnas pa'i nya rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-8: nor dang ldan pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-10: gnyis pa rigs dang ldan pa rnams la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung zhing sa g-yos pas de dag nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-11: chu smad la sa g-yos na bzo mkhas pa rnams la gnod pa mi 'byung zhing mgar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-16: gzhan yang bzo sna tshogs pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-17: grong dang nye ba'i skam la gnas pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-18: gro bzhin la sa g-yos na mi gang zhig rgyal pho mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-20: bstan bcos mkhas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-21: snyan dang gas mkhan rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-23: su ra se na ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-28: de dag gi bsam pa 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:423b-29: mon gre la sa g-yos na nor can rnams la gnod pa 'byung zhing phyug po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-4: grong khyer che ba gzhan rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;mon gru la sa g-yos na chu la gnas pa rnams la gnod pa chen po 'byung zhing glang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-7: rnga mo rnams la cher sdug bsngal 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-8: de bzhin du so ri ra ka pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-14: yul de dag gi skye bo rnams la nad 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-15: me bzhi la sa rnam par g-yos na srin po'i gdon gyis 'dzin cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-16: de bzhin du shan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-18: so pa ri pa rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro; ;tshong gis 'tsho ba'i rje'u rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-23: gyad kyi yud pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-24: khu lo dang ldan pa'i bud med rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-25: mdud pa 'grol ba rnams med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-26: mon gru la sa g-yos na tshong pa rnams la nad 'byung zhing chos la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-28: sho gam gyi las byed pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-29: rgyal rigs srid sgrub kyi rgyud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424a-31: sin du ba'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-0: mda' gzhu thogs pa rnams yun @424b ring por don med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-1: nam gru la sa g-yos na g-yul drag po shom par 'gyur zhing grong 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-2: grong gis grong phung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-3: nir ta pa rnams dang rgya yul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-4: ra ma ta ma gnas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-5: zhing las bzang po byed pa rnams dang; lung pa gnas pa'i gtso bo rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-6: dmag dpon thams cad nges par sreg par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-7: ro; ;tha skar la sa rnam par g-yos na rta rnams la nad 'byung zhing grong rnams 'jig par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-8: spun zla gsod par 'gyur zhing de la mngal chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-9: de la skyes pa dang gsum sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-10: rgyun du ldan par 'gyur zhing mdun rgyud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-13: srid sgrub kyi rgyal rigs rnams phan tshun gsod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-14: bra nye la sa g-yos na rkun ma rnams la nad chen po 'byung zhing rtsod pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-17: me long gi 'khor los slu bar byed pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-18: de bzhin du btson srung rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-20: gnod pa byed pa'i skye bo mi bzad pa rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-21: sa g-yos nas zhag bdun na sprin chen po g-yo bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:424b-22: snum zhing gnag la ri bo lta bu ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-2: dbang po rdo rje lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-3: de bzhin du der dus tshigs ltar nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-4: zla ba sgrib cing de la kun nas sprin chen po'i mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing de dang 'dra bar mthong zhing the tshom bskyed pa'i sprin ldang zhing 'brug bsgrags pa 'byung bar rig par bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-5: de ltar shes nas gdon mi za bar sa bon rnams gdab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-6: bya rnams bsrung na tshong pa rnams kyi bya ba 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-7: de lta bu'i sa g-yos na thams cad du bkra shis par brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-8: yang sa g-yos nas de'i rjes la zhag bdun na sprin ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-9: yang 'di ltar ka shi ka'i gos 'dra ba'i sprin gyis khyab cing mi mthun pa'i sgra sgrogs pas nub phyogs su 'gro la chu la gnas pa'i shu shu ma ra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-12: chu srin 'dra ba'i sprin snang zhing nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-13: zla ba sgrib pa de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa snang na de ni chus sprul pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes drang srong chen po rnams kyis de skad bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-16: zhing rlan dang bral ba de dag rnams la sa bon gdab par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-19: chur 'gyur zhing dma' bar 'dus par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425a-20: de lta bu'i sa g-yos na ni chu'i yin pas shes pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-0: yang 'di ltar sa g-yos @425b nas de'i rjes la zhag bdun gyi nang du rlung drag po mi bzad pa ldang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-1: dus tshigs ltar ser skyar snang la nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-2: zla ba dmar por mthong zhing mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan par snang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-3: de ni rlung gis sa g-yos pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-4: de lta bur gyur pa ni drang srong rnams kyis bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-5: de lta bu la mkhas pas 'gro bar mi bya ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-6: bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing dgra zla las 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bas ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-7: 'obs kyis mchog tu bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-8: de lta bu ni sa'i sa g-yos pa'i yon tan thams cad bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-9: mi rnams kyis me yi sa g-yos pa'i khyad par rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-10: gal te sa g-yos nas de'i rjes la zhag bdun gyi nang du skar mda' drag po ltung zhing dus tshigs ltar dmar la nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-11: zla ba'ang dmar bar snang ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par snang ba ni me yis sa g-yos pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-12: bud shing las me mched par 'gyur bas nor bsregs shing du ba'i phreng ba snang zhing mtshon mchog tu 'bab pa chu 'khyil ba snang ba zla ba dgu'i bar du char mi 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-13: de lta bu'i sa g-yos pa mi bzad pa ni me yis sa g-yos pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:425b-15: rgyal rigs rnams la snga dro'i tsha ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-1: la ni phyed la tsha ba'i nad 'byung la phyi dro ni ba lang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-3: mtshan mo rkun ma rnams la gnod pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-4: nam nangs pa na mtha' khob pa rnams la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-5: de bzhin du nam phyed na ni zhag brgyad kyi bar du na bar 'gyur zhing de nas sos par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-6: de nas yang bud med dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-7: skyes pa la 'byung zhing thun gsum ni zhing rmo ba'i rang bzhin gyi las byed pa rnams la gnod par 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-8: mar ngo la ni drag shul gyi las byed pa'i gtum po rnams la nad 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-9: yar ngo la ni bram ze mchod sbyin byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:426a-13: chos la gnas pa'i gtso bo rnams la tsha ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:429b-21: de ni mchu padma ltar dmar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:429b-22: bud med kyi mgo la smre ba phra zhing lig pu mig gi kha dog lta bu yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:429b-23: de ni dmag dpon gyi chung mar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:429b-24: nu ma gnyis kyi dkyil na thig le lta bu'i sme ba yod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:429b-25: smin ma gnyis kyi mtshams na sme ba yod na de ni khyim thab las 'phyo zhing bag med par spyod la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-2: gang gi mkhur tshos la sme ba yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-3: de ni khyim thab las 'phyog zhing bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-5: rna ba la sme ba yod pa ni thos pa mang zhing bag med par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-6: gang gi mjug to na thig le lta bu'i sme ba yod pa ni thos pa mang zhing khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-7: gang gi ya mchu la sme ba nag po yod pa de ni rdzun smra zhing khyim thab las 'phyo la sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-8: gang gi brla la sme ba yod pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-9: gang gi mchu la sme ba yod pa de ni bag chung zhing khyim thab las 'phyo bar bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-10: gang gsang ba'i nang na sme ba yod pa de ni zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430a-11: skom mang du rnyed par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-0: snar ma la skyes pa'i @430b skyes bu ni nor dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-1: chos la dga' zhing brtson 'grus brtan zhing dpa' la bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
