K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-3: khyad par du bud med la dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-4: lag la skyes pa ni gsod cing gdung la pha rol 'jigs par byed cing las drag po la sbyor la khang pa bzang po rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-5: nam so la skyes pa ni 'dod pa chung zhing blo dang ldan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-6: chos dang tshul khrims dang bcas shing spro thung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-7: rgyal la skyes pa ni bram ze chen po gzi brjid dang ldan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-8: rgyal rigs su gyur nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-9: dmangs rigs kyis mchod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-10: skag la skyes pa ni sna 'bud cing khro la spro thung zhing skyes bu ngan pa rnams la lung gsal bar bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-11: mchu la skyes pa ni shes rab dang ldan zhing lag pa gtsang la bsod nams che zhing de bzhin du nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-12: longs spyod du ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-13: gre la skyes pa ni chos ma yin pa'i blo dang ldan zhing rtag tu bla ma la smod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:430b-14: dbo la skyes pa ni longs spyod dang ldan zhing lha'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi skal ba can gyi skyes bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-0: me bzhi la skyes pa ni bdag nyid skyon med cing rnam par gnon la zas bzang po za zhing dmag @431a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-2: nag pa la skyes pa ni mig mdzes shing gtam sna tshogs la mkhas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-3: blta na sdug cing dbang dang ldan la tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-4: sa ri la skyes pa ni gnyen dang ldan zhing mkhas la 'jam zhing dad pa che la grogs dad che bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-5: sa ga la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni gzi brjid dang ldan la nor mang zhing dpa' zhing pha rol gnon la gtong ba dang ldan zhing skal ba che bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-6: lha mtshams la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni grogs po dang ldan zhing khyim dang ldan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-7: dag cing byas pa gzo la chos kyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-8: snron la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni grogs dang che la kun nas rgyal zhing 'phong gi bstan bcos la mkhas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-9: bud med la dga' ba'i blo can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-10: snubs la skyes pa ni byas pa mi gzo la chos la mi dga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-11: dpa' zhing brtan la sdig pa can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-12: chu stod la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni ser sna che la dbang po rgod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-13: nya'i sha la sred cing shan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-14: chu smad la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni spro thung zhing gtong ba la dga' zhing mkhas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431a-15: dga' mdza' dang ldan zhing gnyen bshes mang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-0: gro bzhin la skyes pa ni bstan bcos la mkhas shing bya ba dang @431b ldan la tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-1: mon gre la skyes pa ni blo rgod cing nor mang la skyes bu thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-2: mon gru la skyes pa ni zhe sdang che zhing tshul khrims dang mi ldan la byi rgyug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-3: khrums stod la skyes pa ni spyod pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing byas pa gzo la de kha ra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-4: khrums smad la skyes pa ni shin tu mkhas shing blo dang ldan la bu mang zhing chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-5: tshul khrims dang ldan zhing nor mang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-6: nam gru la skyes pa ni chos shes shing rig pa sten la dbul zhing nor nyung la gtong ba la dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-7: tha skar la skyes pa ni mkhas shing skye bo'i tshogs dga' zhing dpa' la skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-8: bra nye la skyes pa ni sdig pa la spyod cing mi mkhas la sngar zhing sbyin pa la dga'; zhing gzhan la rten pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-10: de ni skyes pa'i yon tan gyi le'u'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-13: bdag gis gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas mngon sum du byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-14: sems kyis rig pa rnams gtan la phab cing sna tshogs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-15: tshangs pa mchog tu gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-16: de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:431b-17: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na lha rnams kyi tshangs pa mchog tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-1: lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-2: de nas shi 'phos nas bram ze dgon pa ba mu khyud goo ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-3: de nas shi 'phos nas drang srong dkar po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-4: de nas shi 'phos nas tha mal pa'i pandi ta ne tso zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-5: de'i tshe bdag gis rig byed bzhi bklags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-7: rgyal zhes bya ba'i gnod pa'i phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-8: sdeb sbyor gyi gnod pa'i phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-9: cha nyi shu rtsa gcig pa byas shing srid srung rnams bdag gis byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-11: khyod yang de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong ba su zhes bya bar 'gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du de de ltar mi lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-12: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong ba su zhes bya bar gyur to; ;de'i tshe ngas shing mkhas gyi bu mo ser skya mo zhes bya ba chung ma'i don du blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-13: de la bdag kun tu chags pas rdzu 'phrul nyams shing bsam gtan dang bral te; des bdag nyid 'gyod nas de'i tshe dag byed kyi sngags 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-15: ta da sa bhi tu ra ba re n+yam bhar go de ba sa dhvi ma hi di yo na bra rdzod ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-18: ngas khyod la bshad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-19: bdag ni tha mal pa tsam nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-20: 'jig rten du 'di ltar bram ze zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432a-21: rgyal rigs zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-0: rje'u rigs @432b zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-1: mdangs rigs zhes bya ba 'di thams cad gcig pa nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-2: thams cad tha dad pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-3: de bas na bdag gi bu gzhon nu stag rnal 'bu mo gzugs bzang mo chung ma'i don du byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-4: gang rin ji snyed phab pa de 'dod pa bzhin du gzhal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-5: gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku las tshig de lta bu de thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-6: bram ze padma'i snying pos 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-7: khyod ni gcig tu gyur pa'i gtso bo mnyam pa med pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na mnyam pa med pa'i bram ze chen por gyur te; khyod kyi bu la nga'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo sbyin par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-9: gzugs bzang mo gnyis tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-12: bzang zhing mdzes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-13: 'di ni bdag kyang 'dod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-14: de nas bram ze khye'u lnga brgya po de dag gis sgra chen pos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-15: kye; rig pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze rnams gdol pa dang gnyen ma mdzad cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-16: mkhan po rig pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze rig pa gsum pa rnams gdol pa dang lhan cig tu gnyen mdzad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-17: de nas bram ze padma'i snying pos gleng gzhi bshad cing lan gyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-18: tre shang ku des gang smras pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-19: de bzhin de nyid de lta bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:432b-20: de nyid yin te rdzun pa min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-0: @433a *// yang dag mthar gyur bden pa nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-1: de nas bram ze padma'i snying pos bram ze'i khye'u de dag la smras nas gdol ba'i rgyal po tre shang ku la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-2: kye tre shang ku tshangs pa 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-3: mi mdzad bdag pos 'byung bzhi las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-4: skyes bu rnam par sprul pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-5: mgo ni skar tshogs nam mkha' yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-6: de bzhin lto ba bar snang yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-7: ri bo rnams ni brla gnyis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-8: rkang pa gnyis ni sa ru gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-9: nyi ma zla ba mig gnyis yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-10: rtsva dang shing rnams ba spu ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-12: rgya mtsho rnams ni gcin du 'dod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-13: ri bo rnams ni phyi sa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-14: de ni tshangs pa mi mjed bdag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-15: khyod dang shes pa mnyam pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-16: de de bzhin du bdag gis brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-18: de la ni 'dir bdag nyid ci zhig smra ru yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-19: yang rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du dpyad pas pha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-20: mas sbyor ba byas pa las gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-21: bde ba 'dod pas bslus nas sems can rnams mngal du 'jug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-22: 'ga' yang ma skyes pa ni med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-23: 'jig rten thams cad ni skye ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433a-27: dmangs rigs de dag thams cad la zhar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-4: de bzhin du sems can thams cad thams cad tha dad par gnas pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-13: dbang po rnams ni rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir rigs bzhi 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-15: gal te bram ze'i sngags kyi 'bras bu mtho ris su 'gro ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-16: dge sdig gi las kyi 'bras bu med cing chud za bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-17: gang zhig 'gro ba lnga rnams la dge sdig las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par ni mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-18: de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus bram ze padma'i snying po grags pa tshar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-19: de nas bram ze des gdol pa'i rgyal po tri shang ku la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-21: lha'i dbang po koo shi ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-22: goo ta ma rtsibs kyi mu khyud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-24: ne tso mkhas pas rig byed rnams bshad par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-25: lha'i drang srong chen por grags pa dang ldan pa'i mchog dang ltar yang khyod nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-26: 'dir rig pa mchog gis bstan bcos thams cad byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:433b-27: mchog tu khyad par can 'jig rten 'di'i mchog tu gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-0: rigs pa dang ldan par spyod pa khyod yin @434a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-1: pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-3: yon tan dang ldan pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo mna' ma'i don du bdag gis khyod la sbyin par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-5: gzugs bzang mo gnyis mdzes shing mthun pas kyang 'di la mos shing dga'o zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-6: gser gyi bum pa chus bkang ba thogs nas bram ze mngon par dad cing dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-7: mgu ba dang ldan pas chu sbrengs nas bu mo byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-8: 'di skad du'ang bu mo gzugs bzang mo 'di gzhon nu stag rna'i chung ma ru dga' ba'i sems kyis long zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-9: de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus bu mo de rang gi bu de la blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-10: rang gi grong khyer du phyir log ste chos dang ldan par grags pas rang gi rgyal srid bskyangs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-12: khyed de'i tshe de'i dus na gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shad ku zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-13: de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-14: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-15: yang de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-16: gzhon nu stag rna zhes bya ba gdol ba'i rgyal po tre shang ku zhes bya ba'i bur gyur pa de bzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434a-17: de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-0: dge @434b slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-1: gzhon nu stag rna zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-2: yang khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-3: bram ze padma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-4: de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-5: dge slong sh'a radva ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-6: bram ze padma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-7: yang de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo gzugs bzang mo zhes bya ba bram ze padma'i snying po'i bu mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-8: de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-9: dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-10: padma'i snying po'i bu mor gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-12: mdza' ba'i rgyus da ltar dge slong kun dga' bo 'gro na rjes su 'gro zhing 'dug na 'dug la khang pa gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-13: gang du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-15: der mi smra bar gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das gleng gzhi'i rnam pa 'di nyid bstan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-17: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-18: skye ba sngon gyi bag chags kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-19: de ltar yang ni brtse nyid de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-20: de yid gtsugs pa skyes gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-21: chu nang nas skyes ci bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:434b-24: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs pa mngon du ma byas pas brtson 'grus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-2: 'dun pa drag pos tshig tu ma yin pa rtogs par bya zhing dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-3: shes bzhin gyis spyad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-4: bzhi po de dag gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-6: sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-9: sdug bsngal dang lam 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-10: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mngon par ma rtogs pa mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir brtson 'grus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-13: 'dun pa drag pos tshig tu ma yin par rtogs par bya zhing dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-14: shes bzhin gyis sbyar bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-15: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge slong drug cu len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-16: mnyan yod kyi skye bo'i tshogs chen po bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-17: khyim bdag rnams chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-19: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435a-20: mnyan yod kyi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435b-0: @435b dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435b-2: 'phags pa stag rna'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435b-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong aa dzi ta shr'i bha dra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-012:435b-4: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba dge slong sh'akya 'od kyis bsgyur //
